data.question: What is the empirical formula and formula weight of the compound synthesized using 5-(4H-1,2,4-triazol-4-yl)isophthalic acid (H2L1) and copper nitrate?
data.answer: The empirical formula is C10 H5 Cu N3 O4 and the formula weight is 294.71.

data.question: Which compound exhibits a neutral 3D MOF having an rtl topology, resulting from the trigonal pillaring of sql (square lattice) topology?
data.answer: Compound 1, formulated as Cu(L1)·xsolv, exhibits a neutral 3D MOF having an rtl topology.

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group of the compound synthesized using 5-(4-pyridinylmethoxy)isophthalic acid (H2L2) and copper nitrate?
data.answer: The crystal system is Rhombohedral, and the space group is R-3.

data.question: True or False: The compound synthesized using 5-(3-pyridinylmethoxy)-isophthalic acid (H2L3) and copper nitrate has a known topology resulting from a trigonal pillared kgm (Kagomé lattice) topology.
What modifications in the reaction conditions led to the synthesis of a different neutral 3D MOF having an apo topology?
data.answer: Heating a solution of copper nitrate, H2L2, and INB dissolved in DMA, H2O, and EtOH led to the synthesis of a different neutral 3D MOF having an apo topology.

data.question: True or False: The compound synthesized using 5-[(1E)-2-[4-(4-pyridinyloxy)phenyl]diazenyl]isophthalic acid (H2L4) and copper nitrate is expected to have a neutral 3D MOF having a known topology, resulting from a trigonal-pillared kgm (Kagomé lattice) topology.
What is the expected formula of the compound synthesized using H2L4 and copper nitrate?
data.answer: The expected formula of the compound is Cu(L4)·xsolv.

data.question: True or False: The crystal structure of the compound synthesized using H2L3 and copper nitrate reveals a neutral 3D MOF having a known topology, resulting from a trigonal pillared kgm (Kagomé lattice) topology.
What is the crystal system and space group of the compound synthesized using 5-(4-pyridinylmethoxy)isophthalic acid (H2L2), copper nitrate, and INB?
data.answer: The crystal system is Orthorhombic, and the space group is Pbcn.

data.question: True or False: The compound synthesized using H2L2, copper nitrate, and INB exhibits a different neutral 3D MOF having an apo topology, resulting from the trigonal pillaring of sql (square lattice) topology.
